remarks: Change of bound variable using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1996.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)
statement:
gencbvex.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
gencbvex.2 $e |- ( A = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
gencbvex.3 $e |- ( A = y -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
gencbvex.4 $e |- ( th <-> E. x ( ch /\ A = y ) ) $.
gencbvex $p |- ( E. x ( ch /\ ph ) <-> E. y ( th /\ ps ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ch y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d th x $.
